eventSummary: A team warned that scammers or regimes could have exploited a flaw, noting key-reuse patterns suggesting unauthorized clients, and called it the largest documented phone number exposure. All collected data was deleted.Sources:- https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3m5xpar5umq2s

eventSummary: An actor exploited a third-party server used by a municipality to steal and leak internal documents and accessed a database containing citizen police records. This incident is pending verification.Sources:- https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3m5xm74ynkb2h
